name: Project Dungeoneer
description:
Project Dungeoneer is a work-in-progress turn based roguelike with card building gameplay made in Unity.

Currently, we are releasing a demo to show off a verticle slice of the game and get feedback from players.

This demo includes procedurally generated  fully playable dungeons that the player can progress through with increasing difficulty, size, and amount of enemies.

Interact with the alter to get to the next level.

Depending on your luck, you might have to fight through mobs of enemies to get to the next level! Don't forget to loot your slain prey for potions to help you on your adventure with E!

Take your turn by playing a card to Attack, Heal yourself, or build shielding!

Dungeoneer is a roguelike game, so if you die you can try try again. With features in the works such as a merchant system, you will be able to put your hard earned coins to use!
